subject: first great watermelon of the summer
body:
1\. first great watermelon of the summer

2\. it's friday and i don't have any meetings and permission to ignore slack for the day. 

3\. listening to nicole byer's [90 day bae](https://www.patreon.com/90DayBAE) podcast with deborah
